source: ###### Create the observation incremental data frame

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Observation_category_explode_df = Observation_2021_df.select("id",explode(Observation_2021_df.category)).toDF(*("Observation_id","category"))

Observation_category_explode2_df = Observation_category_explode_df.select("Observation_id",explode(Observation_category_explode_df.category.coding)).toDF(*("Observation_id","category"))    

Observation_category_2021_df = Observation_category_explode2_df.select("Observation_id","category.*").toDF(*("Observation_id","category_code","category_display","category_system"))

#-------------create the delta with the existing records------------------
from delta.tables import *

observation_category_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_category/delta/")

Observation_category_2021_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_category/delta/delta2021/")

%%sql
MERGE INTO fhir_data.delta_observation_category target
USING fhir_data.delta_observation_category_2021 source
ON 
source.Observation_id =   target.id
AND source.category_code =    target.category_code
AND source.category_display = target.category_display
AND source.category_system =  target.category_system
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET
target.id = source.Observation_id
,target.category_code = source.category_code
,target.category_display = source.category_display
,target.category_system = source.category_system
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (target.id
,target.category_code
,target.category_display
,target.category_system)
values (source.Observation_id
,source.category_code
,source.category_display
,source.category_system)

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Observation_code_explode_df = Observation_2021_df.select("id","code.text",explode(Observation_2021_df.code.coding)).toDF(*("Observation_id","text","coding"))
Observation_code_2021_df = Observation_code_explode_df.select("Observation_id","text","coding.*").toDF(*("Observation_id","code_text","coding_code","coding_display","coding_system"))

#-------------create the delta with the existing records------------------
from delta.tables import *

observation_code_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_code/delta/")

Observation_code_2021_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_code/delta/delta2021/")

%%sql
MERGE INTO fhir_data.delta_observation_code target
USING fhir_data.delta_observation_code_2021 source
ON
source.Observation_id = target.id
AND source.code_text = target.code_text
AND source.coding_code = target.coding_code
AND source.coding_display = target.coding_display
AND source.coding_system = target.coding_system
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET
target.id = source.Observation_id
,target.code_text = source.code_text
,target.coding_code = source.coding_code
,target.coding_display = source.coding_display
,target.coding_system = source.coding_system
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (target.id
,target.code_text
,target.coding_code
,target.coding_display
,target.coding_system
)
values (source.Observation_id
,source.code_text
,source.coding_code
,source.coding_display
,source.coding_system)

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import explode_outer

Observation_component_explode_df = Observation_2021_df.select("id",explode(Observation_2021_df.component))

Observation_component_explode2_df = Observation_component_explode_df.select("id",explode_outer(Observation_component_explode_df.col.code.coding),"col.code.text",
    "col.valueQuantity.code","col.valueQuantity.system","col.valueQuantity.unit","col.valueQuantity.value").toDF(*("Observation_id","component_code","component_text",
    "component_valueQuantity_code","component_valueQuantity_system","component_valueQuantity_unit","component_valueQuantity_value"))   

Observation_component_2021_df = Observation_component_explode2_df.select("Observation_id","component_code.*","component_text",
    "component_valueQuantity_code","component_valueQuantity_system","component_valueQuantity_unit","component_valueQuantity_value").toDF(*("Observation_id","component_code",
    "component_display","component_system","component_text",
    "component_valueQuantity_code","component_valueQuantity_system","component_valueQuantity_unit","component_valueQuantity_value"))

#-------------create the delta with the existing records------------------
from delta.tables import *

observation_component_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_component/delta/")

Observation_component_2021_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_component/delta/delta2021/")

%%sql
MERGE INTO fhir_data.delta_observation_component target
USING fhir_data.delta_observation_component_2021 source
ON 
source.Observation_id = target.id
AND source.component_code = target.component_code
AND source.component_display = target.component_display
AND source.component_system = target.component_system
AND source.component_text = target.component_text
AND source.component_valueQuantity_code = target.component_valueQuantity_code
AND source.component_valueQuantity_system = target.component_valueQuantity_system
AND source.component_valueQuantity_unit = target.component_valueQuantity_unit
AND source.component_valueQuantity_value = target.component_valueQuantity_value
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET
target.id = source.Observation_id
,target.component_code = source.component_code
,target.component_display = source.component_display
,target.component_system = source.component_system
,target.component_text = source.component_text
,target.component_valueQuantity_code = source.component_valueQuantity_code
,target.component_valueQuantity_system = source.component_valueQuantity_system
,target.component_valueQuantity_unit = source.component_valueQuantity_unit
,target.component_valueQuantity_value = source.component_valueQuantity_value
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (target.id
,target.component_code
,target.component_display
,target.component_system
,target.component_text
,target.component_valueQuantity_code
,target.component_valueQuantity_system
,target.component_valueQuantity_unit
,target.component_valueQuantity_value)
values (source.Observation_id
,source.component_code
,source.component_display
,source.component_system
,source.component_text
,source.component_valueQuantity_code
,source.component_valueQuantity_system
,source.component_valueQuantity_unit
,source.component_valueQuantity_value)

#-------------create the delta with the existing records------------------
from delta.tables import *

observation_valueCodeableConcept_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_valueCodeableConcept/delta/")

Observation_valueCodeableConcept_2021_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_valueCodeableConcept/delta/delta2021/")

%%sql
MERGE INTO fhir_data.delta_observation_valueCodeableConcept target
USING fhir_data.delta_observation_valueCodeableConcept_2021 source
ON 
source.Observation_id = target.id
AND source.valueCodeableConcept_code = target.valueCodeableConcept_code
AND source.valueCodeableConcept_display = target.valueCodeableConcept_display
AND source.valueCodeableConcept_system = target.valueCodeableConcept_system
AND source.valueCodeableConcept_text = target.valueCodeableConcept_text
WHEN MATCHED THEN 
UPDATE SET
target.id = source.Observation_id
,target.valueCodeableConcept_code = source.valueCodeableConcept_code
,target.valueCodeableConcept_display = source.valueCodeableConcept_display
,target.valueCodeableConcept_system = source.valueCodeableConcept_system
,target.valueCodeableConcept_text = source.valueCodeableConcept_text
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (target.id
,target.valueCodeableConcept_code
,target.valueCodeableConcept_display
,target.valueCodeableConcept_system
,target.valueCodeableConcept_text)
values (source.Observation_id
,source.valueCodeableConcept_code
,source.valueCodeableConcept_display
,source.valueCodeableConcept_system
,source.valueCodeableConcept_text)

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Observation_main_2021_df = Observation_2021_df.select(
    "Observation_id","resourceType","issued","status", "patient_id_reference","encounter_id_reference","effectiveDateTime",
    "valueQuantity.code","valueQuantity.system","valueQuantity.unit","valueQuantity.value","valueString").toDF(*(
    "Observation_id","resourceType","issued","status","patient_id_reference","encounter_id_reference","effectiveDateTime",
    "valueQuantity_code","valueQuantity_system",
    "valueQuantity_unit","valueQuantity_value","valueString"))

#-------------create the delta with the existing records------------------
from delta.tables import *

observation_main_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_main/delta/")

Observation_main_2021_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Observation_main/delta/delta2021/")

%%sql
MERGE INTO fhir_data.delta_observation_main target
USING fhir_data.delta_observation_main_2021 source
ON 
source.Observation_id = target.Observation_id          
AND source.resourceType = target.resourceType         
AND source.issued = target.issued                
AND source.status = target.status                
AND source.patient_id_reference = target.patient_id_reference  
AND source.encounter_id_reference = target.patient_id_reference  
AND source.effectiveDateTime = target.effectiveDateTime      
AND source.valueQuantity_code = target.valueQuantity_code        
AND source.valueQuantity_system = target.valueQuantity_system   
AND source.valueQuantity_unit = target.valueQuantity_unit   
AND source.valueQuantity_value = target.valueQuantity_value    
AND source.valueString = target.valueString   
WHEN MATCHED THEN 
UPDATE SET
target.Observation_id  = source.Observation_id          
,target.resourceType = source.resourceType         
,target.issued = source.issued                
,target.status = source.status                
,target.patient_id_reference  = source.patient_id_reference  
,target.encounter_id_reference = source.patient_id_reference  
,target.effectiveDateTime  = source.effectiveDateTime      
,target.valueQuantity_code = source.valueQuantity_code        
,target.valueQuantity_system = source.valueQuantity_system   
,target.valueQuantity_unit   =source.valueQuantity_unit   
,target.valueQuantity_value = source.valueQuantity_value    
,target.valueString  = source.valueString 
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (target.Observation_id        
,target.resourceType         
,target.issued                
,target.status                
,target.patient_id_reference  
,target.encounter_id_reference
,target.effectiveDateTime     
,target.valueQuantity_code    
,target.valueQuantity_system  
,target.valueQuantity_unit    
,target.valueQuantity_value   
,target.valueString    
)
values (source.Observation_id        
,source.resourceType         
,source.issued                
,source.status                
,source.patient_id_reference  
,source.encounter_id_reference
,source.effectiveDateTime     
,source.valueQuantity_code    
,source.valueQuantity_system  
,source.valueQuantity_unit    
,source.valueQuantity_value   
,source.valueString)
